channel.title: Black mesa in SDK(hammer)
channel.description:
hey there, i love to make stuff for games, thats why i want to find out how to get every single weapon,model and texture into hammer.
i know how to configure hammer,but i always do somethink that makes me unable to compile maps...
i tried to configure hammer for HL:S,but it didnt work...
so, can anyone make a config/FGD or something that m akes it easy to configure hammer for black mesa(if possible)
I want to make a BMDM map(even if theres not DM player spawns or DM stuff)
thank you for reading nd i hope someone can help me soon...
i hope i posted this in the right sub forum.. if not,then feel free to move it.
BTW, GREAT MOD(its more like a game made by valve) :freeman:/

item.title: Black mesa in SDK(hammer)
item.dc:creator: mr.Hazard
item.description:
hey there, i love to make stuff for games, thats why i want to find out how to get every single weapon,model and texture into hammer.

i know how to configure hammer,but i always do somethink that makes me unable to compile maps…

i tried to configure hammer for HL:S,but it didnt work…

so, can anyone make a config/FGD or something that m akes it easy to configure hammer for black mesa(if possible)

I want to make a BMDM map(even if theres not DM player spawns or DM stuff)

thank you for reading nd i hope someone can help me soon…
